{{wikipedia|lang=ja}}
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|ご|ぞう|ろく|k3=ろっ|ふ|k4=ぷ|r=y}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|zhx|ja}} {{m|zh|五臟六腑}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|ごぞうろっぷ|y=o}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ごぞうろっぷ}}

# The [[internal organ]]s.

====Usage notes====
* Originating in [[traditional Chinese medicine]], this term has more of a symbolic meaning rather than a medical one.

====Hyponyms====
* "{{lang|ja|五臓}}"
*# {{ja-r|肺臓|はいぞう}}: the lungs
*# {{ja-r|心臓|しんぞう}}: the heart
*# {{ja-r|脾臓|ひぞう}}: the spleen
*# {{ja-r|肝臓|かんぞう}}: the liver
*# {{ja-r|腎臓|じんぞう}}: the kidney
* "{{lang|ja|六腑}}"
*# {{ja-r|大腸|だいちょう}}: the large intestine
*# {{ja-r|小腸|しょうちょう}}: the small intestine
*# {{ja-r|胃|い}}: the stomach
*# {{ja-r|胆|きも}}: the liver
*# {{ja-r|膀胱|ぼうこう}}: the bladder
*# {{ja-r|三焦|さんしょう}}: the [[triple burner]]
